alert.note: Alert for Central Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 3:41PM EST until January 17 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and mixed precipitation expected. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches for a storm total of 6 to 10 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph this evening. * WHERE...Central Piscataquis County. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EST this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and cause localized hazardous travel. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Power outages are possible.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice will make travel extremely dangerous. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.
